subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Dale Hunter, one of four Caps players whose jersey hangs from the rafters of Verizon Center, was named to replace head coach Bruce Boudreau, who was fired early Monday morning.
snippet: Dale Hunter, one of four Caps players whose jersey hangs from the rafters of Verizon Center, was named to replace head coach Bruce Boudreau, who was fired early Monday morning.
